alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Pulaski; Wabash; Wells; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:07PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Wabash, Grant, White, western Blackford, southwestern Huntington, southwestern Pulaski, southwestern Wells, Cass and southern Miami Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 906 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hanging Grove to near Upland. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Logansport, Peru, Hartford City, Gas City, Monticello, Upland, Fairmount, Grissom Afb, Monon, Jonesboro, Sweetser, Walton, Wolcott, Swayzee, Bunker Hill, Francesville, La Fontaine, Van Buren and Royal Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 195 and 198. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 252 and 272. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Blackford; Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Pulaski; Wabash; Wells; White
